20101206180543.000|20101206180545.000|CCO|>> YOU'LL DIG IT.

20101206180551.000|20101206180552.667|CCO|AMERICAN ZEN BUT WIKI LEAKS 
20101206180552.667|20101206180554.333|CCO|FOUNDER HAS THREATENED TO 
20101206180554.333|20101206180556.000|CCO|RELEASE A DOOMSDAY FILE OF  
20101206180556.000|20101206180557.667|CCO|CLASSIFIED INFORMATION ON 
20101206180557.667|20101206180559.333|CCO|EVERYTHING FROM GUANTANAMO BAY  
20101206180559.333|20101206180601.000|CCO|TO AFGHANISTAN. 
20101206180601.000|20101206180602.667|CCO|IF ANY GOVERNMENT TRIES TO  
20101206180602.667|20101206180604.333|CCO|CURTAIL HIS ACTIVITIES. 
20101206180604.333|20101206180606.000|CCO|THAT TO ME SORT OF SOUNDS LIKE  
20101206180606.000|20101206180607.667|CCO|A TERRORIST.
20101206180607.667|20101206180609.333|CCO|THAT'S WHAT TERRORISTS SEEM TO  
20101206180609.333|20101206180611.000|CCO|DO. 
20101206180611.000|20101206180612.429|CCO|TRY TO HOLD COUNTRIES HOSTAGE 
20101206180612.429|20101206180613.857|CCO|IN FEAR.
20101206180613.857|20101206180615.286|CCO|AM I CRAZY OR JUST BEING NUTTY?

20101206180616.714|20101206180618.143|CCO|MATTER. 
20101206180618.143|20101206180619.571|CCO|WHATEVER YOU LABEL IT, IT'S

20101206180627.667|20101206180629.333|CCO|KEEP DOING IT.
20101206180629.333|20101206180631.000|CCO|YOU CAN'T POSSIBLY PROTECT  
20101206180631.000|20101206180632.667|CCO|YOURSELF COMPLETELY IN THE DAY

20101206180634.333|20101206180636.000|CCO|THAT THE INTERNET WORKS.

20101206180656.714|20101206180658.143|CCO|THEY GOING TO CONSIDER HIM A

20101206180702.429|20101206180703.857|CCO|ARE APPLICABLE HERE AND THAT'S  
20101206180703.857|20101206180705.286|CCO|REALLY WHAT THE WHITE HOUSE HAS
